description: One of two girls who love Ryou, or "Ryou-sama". They made Hikari`s and Akari`s clothing. They also egg on the love triangle between Takeru, Mari and Hikari. They seem to have some sort of relationship with each other--accented by the fact that they nearly kissed in one episode--but their love for Ryou seems to prevail over it all.
name: Kurebayashi Amika
